thread.section_title: Weird News News on The Huffington Post
thread.title: People Want To Move To The Newly Found Planets To Escape Donald Trump
thread.title_full: People Want To Move To The Newly Found Planets To Escape Donald Trump

author: Lee Moran
title: People Want To Move To The Newly Found Planets To Escape Donald Trump
text:
People Want To Move To The Newly Found Planets To Escape Donald Trump "Can sleep on the plane." By Lee Moran NASA scientists caused a stir when they announced the discovery of seven previously unknown Earth-sized planets on Wednesday. And with the TRAPPIST-1 solar system a mere 39 light years away, it didn‚Äôt take long for hundreds of Twitter users to declare they‚Äôd be moving there to escape Donald Trump‚Äôs presidency: ‚Äî Saleh Ahmed (@SA_Ahmed_Saigol) February 22, 2017 Nasa discovered 7 new habitable planets. Yall thought I was about to stay for the rest of the Trump presidency? pic.twitter.com/qRu9JkOJDi ‚Äî A osman (@abdirahman_o) February 23, 2017 New #planets lets all go there whilst Trump is sleeping! #TRAPPIST1 ‚Äî Chris Leaney (@actorleaney) February 23, 2017 40 lights yrs away from Trump. Can sleep on the plane. "Astronomers: 7 Earth-sized planets orbiting nearby star. https://t.co/UNHQaJHTsh " ‚Äî Jeffrey Wright (@jfreewright) February 23, 2017 Good NASA finds new planets just when Trump fucks everything up down here. Let's move to the next XD ‚Äî John Lloyd IV (@jalloyd4) February 22, 2017 Let's Leave the Earth to Trump and Putin. May they battle it out. We are flying to #Trappist ! ‚Äî Udo Nobili (@udoAugenAuf) February 22, 2017 
Some tweeters took a different approach by suggesting that Trump could himself be sent there, alone, as a test: Hey @NASA once you guys confirm that life is possible on one of those new planets can we please send Trump as a test-person there? Thanks. ‚Äî Jacob Edward üéß (@Radio_Jacob) February 22, 2017 You knw NASA can always send trump to TRAPPIST-1 just to check whether its safe or not. Really... do dis.. send him....away... asap..like rn ‚Äî Voice of Reason (@raggapegs) February 22, 2017 
Others used the news to throw shade on Trump‚Äôs controversial immigration policies, including his proposed U.S.-Mexico border wall and imminently rewritten travel ban : 7 Earth-like planets found orbiting a star 39 light-years away. Donald Trump extends travel ban to include them, just in case. ‚Äî Albert Brooks (@AlbertBrooks) February 22, 2017 NASA may have found planets capable of supporting life.Trump says they are stealing US jobs and wants to build a wall and steal their oil ‚Äî Mike Spry (@mdspry) February 22, 2017 
Some social media users just imagined Trump‚Äôs reaction to the discovery: Has Trump already tried to convince Nasa to change the name Trappist into Trumpist? ‚Äî Ilaria Mainardi (@Blanche012) February 22, 2017 SCIENCE ADVISOR: We've discovered planets with the potential to support life.TRUMP: Do they know about my electoral college victory? ‚Äî Eric Martin (@MrEricMartin) February 23, 2017 ‚Äú7 Earth-size planets found orbiting nearby star‚Äù How long until Trump takes credit for making galaxy great again. HUGE ‚Äî Kushner Consultants (@KushnerConsults) February 23, 2017 
Plenty of others, meanwhile, just used it to mock the intelligence of Trump and the members of his administration: Better chance of finding intelligent life 40 light-years away, than in the #Trump administration. #justsaying #trappist @NASA
